item.description:
PORTSMOUTH,

Come with us and discover it's art Community!

On the FIRST FRIDAY of every month, from 5 to 8pm downtown Portsmouth celebrates its inspired, intimate urban community with big city style by presenting its Art 'Round Town gallery walk. We'll be visiting 9 local galleries all within a short walking distance from our meeting location in Market Square.

As a thriving creative community rich in history, Portsmouth retains and honors its past while continuously cultivating an ebullient, exciting contemporary art scene. Within its early-nineteenth century brick facades, cobblestone sidewalks, and urban streetscapes, the collective Portsmouth art galleries represent the work of international and national artists from as distant as Europe, New York, San Francisco, and Los Angeles and as near as regional New England. The broad scope of these gallery exhibitions offer you the representational and recognizable, as well as the abstract and avant-garde.

So, whether it's in your backyard, a destination for dinner from beyond, or a summer sojourn, this prestigious community built upon arts and culture will satiate your cravings for original art,food,wine, music, and fashion.

Find out more!

Click here for a list of participating galleries.

This may be an early start for those of you that would be coming from Beyond. But we want you to join us, so just arrive anytime before 6:30 and call so we can tell you our location and you can join us there. All galleries are within a short walking distance form Market Square. Call (603) 759-9876 when you arrive! We'll plan a late dinner after the walk.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Market Square on the corner in front of the Church at 5:30 pm. Contact #: (603) 759-9876

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: "Art 'Round Town Gallery walk", PORTSMOUTH
